item.title: Sakura Miku to be at Hirosaki Neputa Festival this August!
item.dc:creator: vocazn93
item.description:
Do you remember how Sakura Miku was this year’s mascot for Hirosaki’s Cherry Blossom Festival? The …

The post Sakura Miku to be at Hirosaki Neputa Festival this August! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Do you remember how Sakura Miku was this year’s mascot for Hirosaki’s Cherry Blossom Festival? Well, just as announced by Hatsune Miku’s official Twitter account, she’ll make a comeback to celebrate Hirosaki Neputa Festival in August!

ã€ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã€‘æ¥å¹´ã®æ˜¥ã«100å›ç›®ã‚’è¿ãˆã‚‹ã€Œå¼˜å‰ã•ãã‚‰ã¾ã¤ã‚Šã€ã®å…¬å¼å¿œæ´ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã«ãªã£ãŸæ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ãŒã€Œå¼˜å‰ã­ã·ãŸã¾ã¤ã‚Šã€ã¨ã‚‚ã‚³ãƒ©ãƒœæ±ºå®šï¼æœ¬æ—¥ã¯ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’å…¬é–‹ã—ã¦ã„ãã¾ã™ã‚ˆãƒ¼ï¼ã¾ãšã¯iXimaã•ã‚“ã«ã‚ˆã‚‹æµ´è¡£å§¿ã®æ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ï¼å¤§è¿«åŠ›ã®ã­ã·ãŸã¨ã®å…±æ¼”ã§ã™ï¼ #åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ #æ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ #å¼˜å‰ã­ã·ãŸã¾ã¤ã‚Š pic.twitter.com/Ko4NVcb8LQ

— åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ å…¬å¼ (@cfm_miku) July 6, 2019

What is the Hirosaki Neputa Festival?

The Hirosaki Neputa festival is an annual event that is held through August 1st through the 7th. 80 groups participate by walking through the city in fan shaped floats created by each group called “Fan Neputa (æ‰‡ã­ã·ãŸ)” with them being defined as: large fan-shaped floats depicting epic and fantastic images of warriors â€“ parade through the town. In 1980, Hirosaki Neputa Festival was designated as an Important Intangible Folk Cultural Properties of Japan.

Want to know more about the event? Check out Aomori’s sightseeing guide page about it!

A Cherry Blossom Diva Enchanting the Roads!

This year Sakura Miku, a very well known derivative of Miku that is portrayed as a pink colored version with cherry blossom trees in mind; will be representing the festival this year with many collaborative merchandise.

Four key illustrations have been unveiled for this collaboration event, one by the main Crypton Future Media VOCALOID series illustrator, iXima. Who is the lead illustrator for this event:

å¼˜å‰ã­ã·ãŸã¾ã¤ã‚Šã¨ã€Œæ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ã€ãŒã‚³ãƒ©ãƒœã€€ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒ”ãƒ³ã‚°è»Šä¸¡ã‚„é™å®šã‚¿ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ¼ãªã© https://t.co/gpHHL7AF9p ã•ãã‚‰ã¾ã¤ã‚Šã«å¼•ãç¶šãã€å¼˜å‰ã­ã·ãŸã¾ã¤ã‚Šã§æ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ã•ã‚“ã‚³ãƒ©ãƒœã§ã™ï¼æµ´è¡£ã®æ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ã•ã‚“ã¨æ‰‡ã­ã·ãŸã‚’æãã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ã‚ˆã‚ã—ããŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™ pic.twitter.com/JGA5oVnAFE

— Eko iXima (@iximaxima) July 6, 2019

But alongside our beloved Hatsune Miku official illustrator, three other artworks were also introduced for us:

By Nazyo:

ã€ç¶šã€…ãƒ»ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã€‘ä»Šå›ã‚‚ãŠç¥­ã‚Šã«åˆã‚ã›ã¦æ§˜ã€…ãªä¼ç”»ãŒç››ã‚Šæ²¢å±±ã§ã™ï¼ã‚³ãƒ©ãƒœãƒã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚„ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ©ãƒªãƒ¼ã‚‚äºˆå®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã‚ˆï¼è©³ç´°ã¯æœˆæ›œæ—¥ã®åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯å…¬å¼blogã§ãŠå±Šã‘äºˆå®šã§ã™ï¼ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã¯å…ƒæ°—ã„ã£ã±ã„ã«ã­ã·ãŸã¾ã¤ã‚Šã‚’æ¥½ã—ã‚€ãªã˜ã‚‡ã•ã‚“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã§ã™ã‚ˆï¼ #åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ #æ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ #å¼˜å‰ã­ã·ãŸã¾ã¤ã‚Š pic.twitter.com/22GCRHIEaw

— åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ å…¬å¼ (@cfm_miku) July 6, 2019

nekosumi‘s artworks shows us Sakura Miku accompanied by the festival’s official mascot: Takamaru-kun!Ã¨

ã€ç¶šã€…ã€…ãƒ»ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã€‘ãã—ã¦ï¼ã•ãã‚‰ã¾ã¤ã‚Šã«å¼•ãç¶šãä»Šå›ã‚‚å¼˜å‰å¸‚ã®ã‚†ã‚‹ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ©ã€ŒãŸã‹ä¸¸ãã‚“ã€ã¨ã®ã‚³ãƒ©ãƒœã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚‚ï¼æã„ã¦ã„ãŸã ã„ãŸã®ã¯nekosumiã•ã‚“ã§ã™ï¼æ³•è¢«ã¨é‡‘é­šã­ã·ãŸã§ãŠç¥­ã‚Šå‚åŠ ã®æº–å‚™ä¸‡ç«¯ã§ã™ã­ï¼ #åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ #æ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ #å¼˜å‰ã­ã·ãŸã¾ã¤ã‚Š pic.twitter.com/DB1hGap6xt

— åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ å…¬å¼ (@cfm_miku) July 6, 2019

And last but not least the artwork made by Kiyamachi!

ã€ç¶šãƒ»ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã€‘ã€Œå¼˜å‰ã­ã·ãŸã¾ã¤ã‚Šã€ã¯8/1ï¼ˆæœ¨ï¼‰ï½8/7ï¼ˆæ°´ï¼‰ã®æœŸé–“ã§è¡Œã‚ã‚Œã¾ã™ï¼ãŠè¿‘ãã®æ–¹ã¯æ˜¯ééŠã³ã«ãã¦ãã ã•ã„ã­ï¼ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã¯æœ¨å±‹ç”ºã•ã‚“ã®æãå¹»æƒ³çš„ãªæ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã§ã™ï¼æ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ã®å‘¨ã‚Šã‚’ãµã‚ˆãµã‚ˆã¨æ³³ãã€Œé‡‘é­šã­ã·ãŸã€ãŒå¯æ„›ã„ã§ã™ã‚ˆã­ï½â™ª #åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ #æ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ #å¼˜å‰ã­ã·ãŸã¾ã¤ã‚Š pic.twitter.com/pFOimwvm6W

— åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ å…¬å¼ (@cfm_miku) July 6, 2019

They prepared various kinds of promotion activities for this event. In fact, you will find B2 size and strip type posters all around public places, and even a museum booth at Machinaka Information Center.

But there is more of course! Such as Sakura Miku-themed trains and taxis offered by Hokusei Traffic and Konan Railway to a very special Sakura Miku stamp rally starting on July 27th, and they will also holdÂ aÂ lantern contest during the festival, a contest tradition that began in 2016 with “Flying Witch” as theme.

We will get more details about activities and merchandise in the near future, so please stay tuned with us!

Source

With this much content for the giant fan floats, especially with a vibrant pink Miku involved, there will be much fun and celebration at this Hirosaki Neputa festival. Be excited!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese) and Twitter (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese)!
You can find the article this information was discovered on here!
Hirosaki Tourism website and Facebook page

The post Sakura Miku to be at Hirosaki Neputa Festival this August! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Luo Tianyi and Hatsune Miku join with many at this year’s DIVE XR FESTIVAL!
item.dc:creator: vocazn93
item.description:
On July 5th, the official twitter for Dive XR Festival released a tweet revealing who will be at this year’s festival event, including two Vocaloids! The Event The Dive XR festival is a collaboration event where many franchises and Japanese influencers come together and perform in their best suited skill. In 2019, they are inviting …

The post Luo Tianyi and Hatsune Miku join with many at this year’s DIVE XR FESTIVAL! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
On July 5th, the official twitter for Dive XR Festival released a tweet revealing who will be at this year’s festival event, including two Vocaloids!

ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ»ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã®ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚„ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ£ãƒ«ã‚·ãƒ³ã‚¬ãƒ¼ã€VTuberã‚„AIãŸã¡ãŒé›†ã¾ã‚‹éŸ³æ¥½ã®ç¥­å…¸ã€ŒDIVE XR FESTIVAL supported by SoftBankã€é–‹å‚¬æ±ºå®šï¼
7/6(åœŸ)18æ™‚ã‚ˆã‚Šãƒã‚±ãƒƒãƒˆè²©å£²é–‹å§‹ï¼

9/22(æ—¥)ãƒ»9/23(æœˆãƒ»ç¥)å¹•å¼µãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»https://t.co/Ggqj4fM7YN #divexrfes pic.twitter.com/QYMNUQRTmT

— DIVE XR FESTIVAL (@dive_pj) July 5, 2019

The Event

The Dive XR festival is a collaboration event where many franchises and Japanese influencers come together and perform in their best suited skill. In 2019, they are inviting all digital performers from Vocaloids to Virtual youtubers, even gacha game bands to the mix! The event is also supported by Softbank.

Tickets will be available on July 6th, at 18:00 or 6Pm. Tickets are Â¥ 8,800 or roughly $81 per person. Children ages 2 and younger are not allowed. This event will be held at the Makuhari Messe Exhibition Hall 1-3 (Nakase Mihama Ward, Chiba City).

You can purchase tickets in an array of places:

  • Eplus
  • Yahoo! Japan
  • Lawson Ticket
  • Ticket Pia
  • LINE ticket
  • SOGO TOKYO

They have added a way to purchase tickets for English audiences as well as Chinese in Traditional and Simplified here!

Dates

This event will take place September 22nd through the 23rd. With exact dates and times being:

September 22 (Sun) Noon Opening 11:00 – Closing 12:00
September 22 (Sun) Night Opening 17:00 – Closing 18:00
September 23 (Mon, Holiday) Opening 11: 00 – Closing 12:00

Collaboration partners

In the same tweet as before, the official twitter posted an image of which characters will be preforming at this event. On their website, it’s stated not every performer will be there on the same day, but collectively on both days.

On September 22nd: Ensemble Stars!(Trickstar, UNDEAD, and Knights), ARP, EMMA HAZY MINAMI, Kashikomari, Kizuna AI, Hatsune Miku, Fuji Mochi, Monster Z MATE, YuNi, Rinna, Luo Tianyi and more!

On September 23rd: AVATAR 2.0 1st All Stars, Ensemble Stars!Â (Trickstar, UNDEAD, and Knights), Kaminariai feat. Boyackey, Galactic Alice, Ruka Ishino Ruki / Raku Ishino Roki, SHOWROOM Virtual Unit Project, Cyber â€‹â€‹Girl Shiro, Toki no Sora, Hatsune Miku, Hibiki Ao, HIME HINA Suzuki Hina, Marinasu (provisional), Miss Monochrome, Miraiakari, Luo Tianyi, and more!

With this much diversity and talent in these performers, there is no doubt that this event will be very exciting for fans of Vocaloid, Virtual singers and youtubers!

Source

It will be an exciting couple of days when this event comes to the table. All these colorful characters from all kinds of franchises is sure to bring many fans of all together and enjoy everything!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese) and Twitter (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese)!
Dive XR Festival’s events details are on their website and Twitter!
You can find Luo Tianyi on Facebook and Twitter!

 

 

The post Luo Tianyi and Hatsune Miku join with many at this year’s DIVE XR FESTIVAL! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: CangQiong’s new Demo Song “Suspended Spero” is Now Live!

item.description:
Seems Quadimension has a thing for publishing new demo songs around the weekend! We just got a new, marvelous demo song for CangQiong titled “Suspended Spero“! A time for change Composed by CÃ­ DÃ i JÅ«n with lyrics from NÃ³ngsuÅ PÃ¡igÇ” and tuning byÂ  Creuzer, this song shows us a new awesome side of this vocalist! …

The post CangQiong’s new Demo Song “Suspended Spero” is Now Live! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Seems Quadimension has a thing for publishing new demo songs around the weekend! We just got a new, marvelous demo song for CangQiong titled “Suspended Spero“!

A time for change

Composed by CÃ­ DÃ i JÅ«n with lyrics from NÃ³ngsuÅ PÃ¡igÇ” and tuning byÂ  Creuzer, this song shows us a new awesome side of this vocalist!

It’s surely a rock-esque song that will make you turn up the volume! The tuning is a bit wobbly in places, however, it makes her feel alive! The progression of chorus and verse and everything is pretty clean and overall it is a very good song for CangQiong.

About buying CangQiong

She is available on Taobao!

She’s priced 500 RMB for her digital version, adding 15 RMB you can also get the code shipped to you, and if you don’t own a Synthesizer V license yet, you get them both together for 595 RMB!

Those prices however won’t last forever: once the sale period ends she will be back at her standard price so hurry up!

Her release date is scheduled for July 12th and you can buy her here!

Source

If you wish to learn news about Synthesizer V, CangQiong and all other future releases, rely on VNN to deliver the news!

Quadimension is onÂ YoutubeÂ andÂ Weibo
You can also find Stardust onÂ Weibo,Â TwitterÂ andÂ Youtube
CangQiong can be found on Weibo!

The post CangQiong’s new Demo Song “Suspended Spero” is Now Live! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: A VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary is Here!
item.dc:creator: vocazn93
item.description:
Megpoid‘s 10th anniversaryÂ was on June 26th of 2019. The well known Vocaloid music label, VOCALOTRACKS, released an announcement that they will be holding a song contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary. Contest details ğŸ“¢VOCALOID Megpoidç™ºå£²10å‘¨å¹´ã‚’è¨˜å¿µã—ã¦ #GUMI ãŒæ­Œã†ğŸ¤ã‚ªãƒªã‚¸ãƒŠãƒ«æ¥½æ›²ã‚’å‹Ÿé›†â—ä¸–ç•ŒğŸŒğŸŒğŸŒã¸å‘ã‘ã¦å…¨æ›²é…ä¿¡æ‰‹ç¶šãã‚’å®Ÿæ–½ã€‚ï¼ˆè¦å®šæœ‰ï¼‰ğŸ—“7/29ï¼ˆæœˆï¼‰15æ™‚ã¾ã§ã€‚VOCALOID4 Megpoid æœ€å¤§40%OFFã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒšãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚‚å®Ÿæ–½ä¸­ã€€https://t.co/CXZMEZNTMB #vocaloid#vocalotracks#GUMIç”Ÿèª•ç¥­2019#GUMIèª•ç”Ÿç¥­2019 pic.twitter.com/LeAEo3VWhd — VOCALOTRACKS (@VOCALOTRACKS) June 27, 2019 VOCALOTRACKS has given many details and specifics about this …

The post A VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary is Here! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Megpoid‘s 10th anniversaryÂ was on June 26th of 2019. The well known Vocaloid music label, VOCALOTRACKS, released an announcement that they will be holding a song contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary.

Contest details

VOCALOID Megpoidç™ºå£²10å‘¨å¹´ã‚’è¨˜å¿µã—ã¦ #GUMI ãŒæ­Œã†ã‚ªãƒªã‚¸ãƒŠãƒ«æ¥½æ›²ã‚’å‹Ÿé›†ä¸–ç•Œã¸å‘ã‘ã¦å…¨æ›²é…ä¿¡æ‰‹ç¶šãã‚’å®Ÿæ–½ã€‚ï¼ˆè¦å®šæœ‰ï¼‰7/29ï¼ˆæœˆï¼‰15æ™‚ã¾ã§ã€‚VOCALOID4 Megpoid æœ€å¤§40%OFFã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒšãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚‚å®Ÿæ–½ä¸­ã€€https://t.co/CXZMEZNTMB #vocaloid#vocalotracks#GUMIç”Ÿèª•ç¥­2019#GUMIèª•ç”Ÿç¥­2019 pic.twitter.com/LeAEo3VWhd

— VOCALOTRACKS (@VOCALOTRACKS) June 27, 2019

VOCALOTRACKS has given many details and specifics about this contest. The requirements for voicebanks are simple, all Megpoid banks are viable. The application dateline isÂ June 26th through July 29th. The songs can either be new and unpublished or not, any genre is welcome. However, if the song is attached to another label and under specific copyright that it may not be able to used elsewhere, is not allowed.

Songs that are on CD’s are allowed, but only if the rights are available. If there are multiple credits to a song, only one person of that song can upload it. Music using anything that isn’t Megpoid is not allowed, even in harmonies or backing vocals.

Song requirements

In this announcement, the page has listed guidelines for what each song should follow. People who enter will need to register an account, giving their name, email and phone number. This rule is only for first time contest entries for VOCALOTRACKS.

The announcement also gives very detailed information about specifics of the song and file that the song will be on. The file must be in .wav format, in 16 bit and up to 44.1 kHz. The song file must be up to 65 megabytes and up to 6 minutes long. The lyrics must also be available in a .txt file. The thumbnail image must be up to 2500 x 2500 pixels, within an aspect ratio of 1:1. It is also the same with the full photo, but it can be varied depending on the site posted.

There must be credits of every person that worked on the song, especially of the copyright holder.

Every person has a limit of 2 songs.

Distribution sites

Pick up songs from the contest will be availableÂ  though the following websites in Japan :

  • iTunes
  • Amazon
  • AWA
  • Google
  • KKBOX
  • Line music
  • Mora
  • Spotify
  • Youtube
  • Rekochok
  • others (unlisted)

While overseas will find them through those websites instead:

  • iTunes(International)
  • Amazon
  • eMusic T-Mobile World Wide
  • Google music
  • KKBOX
  • Spotify
  • etc…

Extra notes

The announcement also details extra notes, just for clarification.

Any information regarding anything of the song cannot be changed after the deadline. If you are under 20 years old, you must have parental consent before entering. You must apply for consent, and written consent is allowed. Finally, you need to be able to say if your entry or entries infringe on any copyright.

That is all that the article says, follow VOCALOTRACKS on twitter for more updates about this contest! It is certain many great composers from Japan and all over the world will make amazing entries, be waiting!

With this, all of the Internet Co. Ltd vocaloids are now 40% sale off! Check it out if you are interested!

ã€æœ€å¤§40%OFFã€‘#VOCALOID Megpoidç™ºå£²10å‘¨å¹´ã‚’è¨˜å¿µã—ã¦å½“ç¤¾VOCALOIDãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒªã‚’ç‰¹åˆ¥ä¾¡æ ¼ã§ã”æä¾›ãƒœãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ­ã‚¤ãƒ‰ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯é…ä¿¡å°‚ç”¨ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒ™ãƒ«ã€ŒVOCALOTRACKSã€ã§ã¯ã€#Megpoid ãŒæ­Œã†æ¥½æ›²ã‚’å‹Ÿé›†ä¸­ä»Šã‹ã‚‰ãŠæ±‚ã‚ã®ä¸Šã”å¿œå‹Ÿã„ãŸã ãã“ã¨ã‚‚å¯èƒ½https://t.co/btNNq8giPC#GUMI#GUMIèª•ç”Ÿç¥­2019 pic.twitter.com/87Sh8MHIg3

— shopsswjp (@shopsswjp) June 27, 2019

You can find GUMI onÂ FacebookÂ andÂ Twitter
Same goes for Internet Co. Ltd, which also has english-speaking social medias! Find them on Facebook (Japanese/English) or Twitter (Japanese/English).
Contest page

The post A VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary is Here! appeared first on VNN.
